@ The rest of you who downloaded its a disgrace that none of you thanked 20-40, its utterly offending. He asks nothing from us and this is how you repay him? Disgraceful.

@Stev: As usual, my friend. Last week my torrents have 26163 downloads.
I bet that you know anyone who even bothered to say something. It looks like people who came here not understand what I'm sayin';
There is only 24 who have spoken at all.
Out of 26163 - that is less than 0.0001%.
Deduct calls "motherfucker", insults and stupidities - and I was hoping that   people would see what's going on. 

It was NEVER about people who say something. Even stalkers and maniacs have been more vocal then the rest -  their verbal poop is written testimony of their insanity, and I know (IP address can be seen as accompanies every comment) that some of them came for evil purpose they are louder in that apparent wasteland of TPB than silent majority.

However, I have followed your list from few days back and even if some shows must be upped as [quark] I hope you can find any show you've ranked.
